(Archangle, you're not a TM3. They all said you were moding because 
you do not know about the driver. My team still has it.)

Vulois sits in the rafters, and hears Hell Beast's response. He sends 
a message to Battera and Soundwave.

"All right, this is what I want you to do. Turn Battera into a TM3, 
and then hurry down to the Pred base with the driver. It seems we've 
made a breakthrough. Hell Beast is listening to us. I'll see you all 
at the Pred base."

Vulois drops down as all the other Predacons stare at him in disgust. 
He walks with Hell Beast to his study, and tells him his offer.

"All right, Hell Beast. Basically my team and I want to go home. 
We're tired of the war. So we want a deal. The three of us are named 
your "joint council" so to speak. Your advisers. Your seconds in 
command. We basically deliver your messages and are in charge while 
you are away. With this title we will, with a little Predacon techno 
help, be able to turn the next pod that crashes into a suitable ship 
for 3. We would construct this on our own time, as to not interfere 
with your plans. In return, we will return this mind-whiping device 
to you and give you the secret of Transmetal 3 technology. You could 
turn all the Preds into it and then have a stronger army than the 
Maximals. When the three of us leave, we will not ask for the driver 
back. It will be yours to keep. If you are looking for another 
advantage point, than say we reach Cybertron. We can tell them of 
the "noble and coragiuos" acts that Hell Beast has done in the Neo 
Beast Wars, in the name of Predacons everywhere. This may spur those 
Preds on and make them fight harder, maybe even making it easier for 
you to conquer Cybertron when this is done. What do you say?"
